fields.Title of Presentation: Needs Assessment of Interpretation Services in Boise: Agency and Interpreter Perspectives
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: American Public Health Association Annual Meeting
fields.Description/Abstract: In this exploratory study, researchers surveyed interpreters and representatives of the agencies that use them in Boise, Idaho to identify opportunities to enhance the interpretation services available to persons with LEP.  The results of this needs assessment were consistent with the limited national research found. While both interpreters and agencies were primarily satisfied with the services, there were gaps between what the agencies need and what is available. A primary opportunity identified by the respondents included increased communication and collaboration among agencies and interpreters.
